North_Charleston.William Robb House:
The William Robb House is 19th-century house in Charleston, South Carolina at 12 Bee Street.


== History ==
The Robb House is significant for its association with William Robb, partner in the East Point Rice Mill, and with philanthropist William King McDowell. William Robb (1790-1885) was the son of James Robb (1790-1859) a Scottish merchant born in Logie Parish near Stirling.
